title: for devs  how does new hurricans effect temmo passive
body: ok so in patch 7.9 u guys said u are removing  on hit dmg  from hurricanes does that mean huricans does not stack pasive for temmo on bolts hit

replies.body: fix your grammer, puncuation and spelling. and then talk to me
Please fix your spelling, cause your killing me here buddy. Also, as far as i know, the Hurricane hasn't been changed regarding Teemo's E.
